5420.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
5420.verse-english: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

clauses-english.clause: We sent Noah to his people,
"Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment.

5421.verse-arabic: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
5421.verse-english: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,

clauses-english.clause: indeed I am to you a clear warner,

5422.verse-english: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.

5423.verse-arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
5423.verse-english: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "

clauses-english.clause: God will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term.

5424.verse-arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
5424.verse-english: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

clauses-english.clause: indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

5425.verse-english: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

clauses-english.clause: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

5426.verse-arabic: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
5426.verse-english: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

clauses-english.clause: every time I invited them that You may forgive them,
they put their fingers in their ears,

5428.verse-arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
5428.verse-english: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

clauses-arabic.clause: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا

clauses-english.clause: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

5429.verse-arabic: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
5429.verse-english: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

clauses-english.clause: He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

5430.verse-english: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

clauses-english.clause: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

5431.verse-arabic: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
5431.verse-english: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

clauses-arabic.clause: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا

clauses-english.clause: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

5432.verse-arabic: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
5432.verse-english: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

clauses-arabic.clause: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا

clauses-english.clause: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to God [due] grandeur

5433.verse-english: While He has created you in stages?

clauses-english.clause: While He has created you in stages?

5434.verse-arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
5434.verse-english: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

clauses-arabic.clause: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا

clauses-english.clause: Do you not consider how God has created seven heavens in layers

5435.verse-arabic: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
5435.verse-english: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

clauses-arabic.clause: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا

clauses-english.clause: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

5436.verse-english: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

clauses-english.clause: And God has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

5437.verse-english: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

clauses-english.clause: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

5438.verse-english: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

clauses-english.clause: And God has made for you the earth an expanse

5439.verse-english: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

clauses-english.clause: That you may follow therein roads of passage.

5440.verse-arabic: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
5440.verse-english: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

clauses-english.clause: indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

5441.verse-english: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

clauses-english.clause: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

5442.verse-arabic: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
5442.verse-english: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

clauses-english.clause: 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

5443.verse-arabic: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
5443.verse-english: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

clauses-english.clause: And already they have misled many.
do not increase the wrongdoers except in error.

5444.verse-arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
5444.verse-english: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

clauses-english.clause: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire,
and they found not for themselves besides God [any] helpers.

5445.verse-arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
5445.verse-english: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

clauses-english.clause: do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

5446.verse-arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
5446.verse-english: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

clauses-english.clause: they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

5447.verse-arabic: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
5447.verse-english: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."

clauses-english.clause: forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women.
And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction.
